paper_metadata.title: Amyloid Transthyretin Cardiomyopathy in Elderly Patients With Aortic Stenosis Undergoing Transcatheter Aortic Valve Implantation
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on a single variant in the TTR gene, including penetrance data and individual records.

patients.demographics: Age not specified, sex not specified

individual_records.evidence_sentence: A single transthyretin mutation (Val30Met) was found in a patient with strong 99mTc‐DPD uptake.

functional_data.summary: The Val30Met variant is associated with amyloid transthyretin cardiomyopathy.

variants.additional_notes: Only one variant was identified in the study.
key_quotes: A single transthyretin mutation (Val30Met) was found in a patient with strong 99mTc‐DPD uptake.

extraction_metadata.notes: Only one variant in the TTR gene was reported in the paper.
